0.6.name: wordpress/awesm
0.6.description:
awe.sm provides sharing analytics. This plugin provides awe.sm-powered buttons for Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, LinkedIn, Google+, Pinterest, and email. It requires an awe.sm subscription for stats.

Contributing code

The development source code for this plugin is available on awe.sm's GitHub account. Pull Requests and code discussion welcome.
